players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I am the detective and I found Bob is the mafioso"
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. I will continue to protect my own."
Charlie: "I am the villager and I heard Alice's accusation. Bob confessed to being the mafioso, so I will support him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
